root.title: 65 Mendur-Sokkon VI
root.place: The inscription is on small stone plate found in ravine Qara-su.
root.store: Stored in the National Museum named after Anokhin. Inv. # 10472.
root.description: One line text consists of 11 or 12 characters.
root.size: Height of characters is from 2 to 2.5 cm, length of line is 15.6 cm.
root.investigation: Shaldurov found in 1997. Publication: Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
